snippet: Driven largely by digital purchases, and by the singer Adele, sales of complete albums in the United States grew by 1.3 percent from 2010.
abstract: Nielsen SoundScan reports sales of complete albums, the industry's most profitable product, rose 1.3 percent in 2011 to 330.6 million from 2010; album sales had fallen every year since 2004.
lead_paragraph: Driven largely by digital purchases, and by the singer Adele, sales of complete albums in the United States grew by 1.3 percent from 2010.

headline.seo: Complete Album Sales Showed Slight Growth in 2011
headline.main: Full Album Sales Showed a Little Growth in 2011
headline.print_headline: Full Album Sales Showed A Little Growth in 2011
